data_table.description: Dietary Intake Form, DTIC, Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: DTIAFLAG
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Flag indicating the presence of DTIA [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIACY
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Contact year [1] [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA01
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Skim or low fat milk; 8 oz. glass. Q1 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA02
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Whole milk; 8oz. Glass. Q2 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA03
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Yogurt; 1 c. Q3 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA04
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Ice cream; 1/2 c. Q4 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA05
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Cottage cheese or ricotta cheese; 1/2 c. Q5 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA06
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Other cheeses, plain or as part of a dish; 1 slice or serving. Q6 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA07
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Margarine or a margarine/butter blend; pats added to food or bread. Q7 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA08
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Butter; pats added to food or bread. Q8 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA09
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Fresh apples or pears; 1. Q9 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA10
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Oranges; 1. Q10 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA11
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Orange or grapefruit juice; small glass. Q11 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA12
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Peaches, apricots, plums; 1 fresh or 1/2 c. canned or dried. Q12 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA13
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Bananas; 1. Q13 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA14
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Other fruits; 1 fresh or 1/2 c. canned, including fruit cocktail. Q14 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA15
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... String or green beans; 1/2 c. Q15 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA16
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Broccoli; 1/2 c. Q16 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA17
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Cabbage, cauliflower, brussels sprouts; 1/2 c. Q17 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA18
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Carrots; 1 whole or 1/2 c. cooked. Q18 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA19
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Corn; 1 ear or 1/2 c. Q19 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA20
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Spinach, collards, or other greens, but do not include lettuce; 1/2 c. Q20 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA21
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Peas or lima beans; 1/2 c. fresh, frozen or canned. Q21 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA22
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Dark yellow, winter squash such as acorn, butternut; 1/2 c. Q22 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA23
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Sweet potatoes; 1/2 c. Q23 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA24
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Baked beans or lentils, dried cooked or canned, such as pinto, black eye, baked beans; 1/2 c. Q24 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA25
variable.description: [Vegetables]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Tomatoes; 1, or tomato juice; 4 oz. Q25 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA26
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Chicken or turkey, without skin. Q26 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA27
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Chicken or turkey, with skin. Q27 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA28
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Hamburgers; 1. Q28 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA29
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Hot Dogs; 1. Q29 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA30
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Processed meats: sausage, salami, bologna, etc.; piece or slice. Q30 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA31
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Bacon; 2 slices. Q31 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA32
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Beef, pork, or lamb as a sandwich or mixed dish, stew, casserole, lasagne, or in spaghetti sauce, etc. Q32 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA33
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Beef, pork, or lamb as a main dish, steak, roast, ham, etc. Q33 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA34
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Canned tuna fish; 3-4 oz. Q34 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA35
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Dark meat fish, such as salmon, mackerel, swordfish, sardines, bluefish; 3-5 oz. Q35 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA36
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Other fish, such as cod, perch, catfish, etc.; 3-5 oz. Q36 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA37
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Shrimp, lobster, scallops as a main dish. Q37 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA38
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Eggs; 1. Q38 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA39
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Chocolate bars or pieces, such as Hershey's, Plain, M&M's, Snickers, Reeses; 1 oz. Q39 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA40
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Candy without chocolate; 1 oz. Q40 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA41
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Pie, homemade from scratch; 1 slice. Q41 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA42
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Pie, ready-made or from a mix; 1 slice. Q42 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA43
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Donut; 1. Q43 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA44
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Biscuits or cornbread; 1. Q44 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA45
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Danish pastry, sweet roll, coffee cake, croissant; 1. Q45 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA46
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Cake or brownie; 1 piece. Q46 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA47
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Cookies; 1. Q47 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA48
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Cold breakfast cereal; 1/2 c. Q48 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA49
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Cooked cereals such as oatmeal, grits, cream of wheat; 1/2 c. Q49 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA50
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... White bread; 1 slice. Q50 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA51
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Dark or whole grain bread; 1 slice. Q51 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA52
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Peanut butter; 1 tbsp. Q52 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA53
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Potato or corn chips; small bag or 1 oz. Q53 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA54
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... French fried potatoes; 1 serving, 4 oz. Q54 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA55
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Nuts; 1 oz. Q55 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA56
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Potatoes, mashed; 1 c. or baked; 1. Q56 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA57
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Rice; 1/2 c. Q57 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA58
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Spaghetti, noodles or other pasta; 1/2 c. Q58 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA59
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Home-fried food, such as any meats, poultry, fish, shrimp, eggs, vegetables, etc.; 1 serving. Q59 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA60
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Food fried away from home, such as any fish, chicken, chicken nuggets, etc. Q60 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA61
variable.description: [Beverages]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Coffee, not decaffeinated; 1 c. Q61 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA62
variable.description: [Beverages]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Tea, iced or hot, not including decaf or herbal tea; 1 cup. Q62 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA63
variable.description: [Beverages]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Low calorie soft drinks, such as any diet Coke, diet Pepsi, diet 7-Up; 1 glass. Q63 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA64
variable.description: [Beverages]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Regular soft drinks, such as Coke, Pepsi, 7-Up, ginger ale; 1 glass. Q64 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA65
variable.description: [Beverages]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Fruit-flavored punch or non-carbonated beverages, such as lemonade, Kool-Aid or Hawaiian Punch; not diet; 1 glass. Q65 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA66
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. How often do you eat liver; 3-4 oz. serving. Q66 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA67
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Are there any other foods that you usually eat at least twice per week such as tortillas, prunes, or avocado? Do not include dry spices nor something that has been listed previously. Q67 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA68
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Code of first other food. Q68 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA68A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. List first other food and usual portion size. Q68a [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA69
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Frequency of first other food. Q69 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA70
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Code of second other food. Q70 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA70A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. List second other food and usual portion size. Q70a [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA71
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Frequency of second other food. Q71 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA72
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Code of third other food. Q72 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA72A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. List third other food and usual portion size. Q72a [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA73
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Frequency of third other food. Q73 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA74
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. What do you do with visible fat on meat. Q74 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA75
variable.description: Type of fat used in frying

variable.name: DTIA76
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Code for frying source. Q76 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA76A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Brand and form for frying. Q76a [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA77
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. [RC 5] What kind of fat do you usually use for baking? Q77 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA78
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Code for baking source. Q78 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA78A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Brand and form for baking. Q78a [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA79A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. [RC 6] What brand and form of margarine do you usually use at the table? Q79a [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA79B
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Code for margarine. Q79b [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA79C
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Brand for margarine. Q79c [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA80
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. What kind of cold cereal do you most often use? (Enter code). Q80 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA80A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Brand of breakfast cereal. Q80a [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA81
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Are you currently on a special diet? Q81 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA82
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. How many years on the special diet. Q82 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA83
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Type of diet. Q83 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA84
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. How many teaspoons of sugar do you add to your food daily? Include sugar added to coffee, tea, cereal, etc. Q84 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA85
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. [RC 8] In cooking vegetables, how often do you add fat such as salt pork, butter, or margarine? Q85 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA86
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. [RC 8] How often is salt or salt-containing seasoning such as garlic salt, onion salt, soy sauce, or Accent added to your food in cooking? Q86 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA87
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. How many shakes of salt do you add to your food at the table every day? Q87 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA88
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. [RC 8] How often do you add catsup, hot sauce, soy or steak sauces to your food? Q88 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA89
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. [RC 8] How often do you eat special low salt foods such as low salt chips, nuts, cheese, or salad dressing? Q89 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA90
variable.description: [Alcohol]. I am going to ask you about wine, beer, and drinks made with hard liquor because these are the three major types of alcoholic beverages. Do you presently drink alcoholic beverages? Q90 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA91
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Have you ever consumed alcoholic beverages? Q91 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA92
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Approximately how many years ago did you stop drinking. Q92 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA93
variable.description: [Alcohol]. For how many years did you drink alcoholic beverages? Q93 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA94A
variable.description: [Alcohol]. In the past, which types of alcoholic beverages did you ordinarily drink? Drink wine? Q94a [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA94B
variable.description: [Alcohol]. In the past, which types of alcoholic beverages did you ordinarily drink? Drink beer? Q94b [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA94C
variable.description: [Alcohol]. In the past, which types of alcoholic beverages did you ordinarily drink? Drinks made from hard liquor? Q94c [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA94D
variable.description: [Alcohol]. In the past, which types of alcoholic beverages did you ordinarily drink? Drink others. Q94d [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA94E
variable.description: [Alcohol]. In the past, which types of alcoholic beverages did you ordinarily drink? List other drinks. Q94e [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA95
variable.description: [Alcohol]. What was the usual number of drinks you had per week before you stopped drinking alcoholic beverages? Q95 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]
variable.comment: One drink means 1 beer or 1 glass of wine or 1 shot of liquor or 1 mixed drink

variable.name: DTIA96
variable.description: [Alcohol]. How many glasses of wine do you usually have per week? (4 oz. glasses; round down). Q96 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA97
variable.description: [Alcohol]. How many bottles of cans of beer do you usually have per week? (12 oz. bottles or cans; round down). Q97 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA98
variable.description: [Alcohol]. How many drinks of hard liquor do you usually have per week? (1 1/2 oz. shots; round down). Q98 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA99
variable.description: [Alcohol]. During the past 24 hours, how many drinks have you had? Q99 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA100A
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Drank wine in the past 24 hrs. Q100a [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA100B
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Drank beer in the past 24 hrs. Q100b [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA100C
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Drank liquor in the past 24 hrs. Q100c [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA102
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Interviewer's opinion of information. Q102 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA104
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Method of data collection. Q104 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA105
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Code of person completing form. Q105 [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]

variable.name: DTIA103DAYS
variable.description: Days of data collection since exam 1

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Dietary Intake Form, exam 1]
